A Google search for _food blog_ yields about 7,850,000,000 results. I half-joke.
I’ve had this domain for a long, long time now and never did anything with it,
and the chance to write URLs like [harry.is/cooking](/cooking/) was far too good
an opportunity to miss.

Let’s see where this thing goes…
